profile.name: Kirito
profile.title: The Black Swordsman
profile.description: A solo player in Sword Art Online, known for his dual-wielding skill. He is a Beater, a combination of a beta tester and a cheater, due to his extensive knowledge of the game. His main goal is to clear all 100 floors of Aincrad and free all the players trapped in the death game.

skills.name: One-Handed Sword
skills.description: The ability to skillfully wield a single-handed longsword, curved blade, or dagger. This is one of the most common skills in Sword Art Online.

skills.name: Dual Blades
skills.description: A Unique Skill granted to the player with the fastest reaction time in the game. It allows the use of two swords simultaneously, unlocking a new set of powerful sword skills.

skills.name: Martial Arts
skills.description: A skill that involves fighting without any weapons. It includes various punches and kicks, and can be used to stun opponents.

skills.name: Blade Throwing
skills.description: Allows the user to throw small blades like daggers or knives with high accuracy and precision.

skills.name: Searching
skills.description: A skill that helps in detecting hidden players or monsters, as well as finding hidden items or traps in dungeons.

skills.name: Hiding
skills.description: Allows the player to become almost invisible to the naked eye, perfect for ambushes or escaping dangerous situations.

inventory.name: Elucidator
inventory.description: A demonic monster drop from a 50th Floor boss. It is a pitch black sword with a jet-black grip, and is Kirito's primary weapon.

inventory.name: Dark Repulser
inventory.description: A sword crafted by the blacksmith Lisbeth from a Crystallite Ingot, a rare mineral in the world of SAO. It is a pale, aqua-colored sword used as Kirito's secondary weapon.

inventory.name: Coat of Midnight
inventory.description: A black leather coat that is Kirito's signature outfit. It was a last attack bonus from the 1st Floor boss, Illfang the Kobold Lord.

questLog.title: Clear Floor 1: Illfang the Kobold Lord
questLog.description: Participated in the raid party to defeat the first floor boss and unlock the path to the next floor. Earned the 'Coat of Midnight' as a Last Attack bonus.

questLog.title: The Gleam Eyes: Floor 74 Dungeon
questLog.description: Single-handedly defeated 'The Gleam Eyes' to save the members of the 'Aincrad Liberation Force'. This event revealed the 'Dual Blades' unique skill to the public.

questLog.title: Subdue the Laughing Coffin Guild
questLog.description: Joined the crusade to confront and defeat the notorious red player guild, 'Laughing Coffin', who indiscriminately killed other players.

questLog.title: Clear all 100 Floors of Aincrad
questLog.description: The ultimate quest to beat the game, free all players, and return to the real world.
